name: Girls Play Sport - Basketball Fundamentals
description: For preparation to participate in Jr Warriors league with this fundamentals class. Girls will review weekly dribbling, shooting and rebounding some game play will be provided.
fullDescription: For preparation to participate in Jr Warriors league with this fundamentals class. Girls will review weekly dribbling, shooting and rebounding some game play will be provided.
whatTheyOffer: For preparation to participate in Jr Warriors league with this fundamentals class. Girls will review weekly dribbling, shooting and rebounding some game play will be provided.
howToGetIt: Register online at sfrecpark.org/register or call the registration hotline at (628) 652-2900
